geo_banner.text: It looks like you are in {{country}}. Do you wish to change the language to {{lang}}?

notfound.headline: Oops! Looks like we're lost.
notfound.subheadline: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notfound.reason_1: There was a small typo in the URL.
notfound.reason_2: The link you clicked is old or broken.
notfound.reason_3: The page was moved or renamed during an update.

persona_banner.desc_casual: You are currently browsing my professional side, but what if I told you there's a hidden level around here? I invite you to check out my casual side, read my blog posts, and see what I'm up to offline.
persona_banner.desc_pro: You are browsing my casual side, but if you want to suit up, get serious, and check out my projects, resume, and technical skills, just turn the key.
